subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: Hippo ECM can be used in a wide variety of cases, and can be tailored where needed. Hippo does not enforce structure, although it does bring clarity in the enormous amount of information that users have to cope with on a day to day basis. Some of the most common usages are listed in this section.

subsection.name: Using Hippo ECM for Document Management
subsection.p: Out of the box, Hippo ECM provides Document Management functionalities that allows users to share and collaborate on documents. Hippo ECM extends standard Document Management functionalities by allowing users to organize all information in a way that is most useful to themselves or to the group they participate in, without forcing anyone to use a certain predefined structure.
By using the Hippo ECM Faceted interface, anyone can start adding documents in no time without having to worry about the structure in which information should be stored.

subsection.name: Using Hippo ECM for Web Content Management
subsection.p: Hippo ECM provides one integrated environment through which you can publish your content to the web, whether it is on the internet, intranet, extranet or any combination of those. A toolkit is available for rapid development of tailor-made websites, while its use of open standards makes integration of Hippo ECM in an existing environment easy and straightforward. Out of the box features like a fast and effective search engine and faceted navigation let your users find the information they are looking for with minimal effort, optimizing the user experience.

subsection.name: Using Hippo ECM for Technical Documentation
subsection.p: Content reuse and unlimited possibilities to organize your content in different ways make Hippo ECM particularly well suited to manage your technical documentation. Let your specialists maintain content such as specifications, manuals, andd part lists in their respective fields of knowledge, and assemble the same content into many different publications, based on their target audience and publication media. Advanced version management and authorization, and fine grained content reuse make sure your audience always gets tailor made and up-to-date information, through the web, PDF, and print.
